column2: wanqūl yā rasūl al-lah yā khayr al-anām

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raml al-māyah. qaṣīdah. ṭawīl

column2: wamin dhalik al-wādī ta‘aṭṭart yā ṣabā
ará kull mushtāqin ilá al-miṣr qad ṣabā

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥusayn. qaṣīdah. mjzū’ al-rajaz
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥusayn. tawshīḥ muḍāri‘ lilḥalbī

column2: in talqah al-usd fī ājāmihā tajim
man ya‘taṣim bik yā khayr al-wará sharafan
